name: LaTale W
description:
Now, continue your nonstop adventure on mobile!
Get excited because we are going to begin a journey together!

Explore Open World with Field Boss Raid and Challenging Dungeons.
Plus, Upgrading your own space with item craft through Fishing, Logging, Gathering, and Mining!


[FEATURES]

◈ Dazzling Action
There are four unique classes with class changes, and skill combo with various combinations!
Easy to control but cool and fascinating action!

◈ Reliable Companion
Over 300 pets are waiting for you in Latale World.
Choose your own pets to start the adventure with!
Pretty sure they will be very reliable supporters!

◈ LaTale W and the Fashionista
Adorable? Beautiful? Elegant? Chic? No more identical equipment and characters!
Show off your stylish character in a world like a fairy tale.
You are the fashionista! Check out the fashion in LaTale W now!

◈ Craft & Trade Master
Have fun of crafting/trading your own items!

◈ Play Together
Hunting alone? Not anymore!
Strategize with your party and power up with guild buff!
Play with millions of players in LaTale World!

◈ Your Own Space
You can have your own space in LaTale World.
Customize your house and have a party all night long! Today is the day!

▣ If you want to know LaTale W? ▣
Official Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/PlayLaTaleW/

Time for real adventure, LaTale With you!

• Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.
